svg.style: background: #ffffff; background-color: light-dark(#ffffff, var(--ge-dark-color, #121212)); color-scheme: light dark;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 318px; height: 1px; padding-top: 33px; margin-left: 23px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Arial; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
• Network never saw CTCF motif labels during training
• Learned only from chromatin prediction task (919 features)
• ~40% of first-layer filters match known JASPAR motifs
• Confirms model captures genuine regulatory grammar

switch.text: • Network never saw CTCF motif labels during training...
